response.original_title: GV: Extreme Accuracy Tactical Sniper Shooting Techniques
response.overview: In this program Tubb details and describes the equipment needed to execute pinpoint accuracy at 50 to 200 yards. Youâ€™ll learn how to utilize ammunition, scopes, and trigger control to be able to hit a quarter at 50 yards. Tubb demonstrates a revolutionary sling technique and three different shooting positions. If you want to shoot with precision at realistic law enforcement distances, this program is an excellent resource and an exceptional training aid.
